name: Silvia Gulbenkian
title: budtender
coverLetter: As a type 1 diabetic, marijuana has changed my life and made my diabetes much easier to manage. When I turned 18 I got a doctor's recommendation and began going to dispensaries. I now have a deep understanding of a wide variety of strains and their various effects. I hope to be able to bring people the joy I felt when going to dispensaries and getting my medicine.
experience:
Mi Corazon, Glendale — Host

October 2016 -2017

Assisted and greated restaurant patrons as they came to find their seating.

Postmates, LA —Delivery driver October 2016-2017

5 star delivery driver with over 700 total deliveries.
